name: Black Women Yoga Studio
address: Miami Gardens, FL (Specific address not provided in search results)
description: Founded by Denetrya Brookins, this studio aimed to be a welcoming space for Black women. It offered classes like Trap Yoga. The studio has since moved away from a physical location to focus on community-based classes

name: Black Yogis of South Florida
address: Primarily operates in Miami Gardens, FL, and collaborates with Co-Space. (Specific studio address not provided)
description: An organization founded by Kiyona Miah and Jasmine Nicole that creates community, wellness workshops, and promotes representation in yoga for Black individuals. They partner with spaces like Co-Space to host events
